column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Food: I previously ordered the Tonkotsu Assari and the Cha Cha Cha and loved those bowls. This time I ordered the Tokyo Yatai Ramen ($10.95) to try something different. Sadly
column2: I was pretty disappointed with the Tokyo Yatai Ramen and should have ordered the Tonkotsu Assari. The broth was absolutely delicious and the thin noodles were perfect. However
column3: the chicken didn't fit well (or maybe because I was spoiled with the other dishes) and would not recommend people to get the Tokyo Yatai Ramen (unless you really like chicken). The Tokyo Yatai Ramen dish gets a 3/5.
